asset_source.description: The address of the asset on ethereum

vega_asset_id.description: The ID of the vega asset

nonce.description: The nonce, which is actually the internal reference for the proposal

signatures.description: The signatures bundle as hex encoded data, forward by 0x e.g: 0x + sig1 + sig2 + ... + sixN

GetERC20AssetBundleResponse.title: Get ERC 20 Asset Bundle Response
GetERC20AssetBundleResponse.description: The response with all information required to bundle the call to propose an erc20 asset
